titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Red Ribbon Week, October 23, 2013 through October 31, 2013.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
10/14/2013--Introduced. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of Red Ribbon Week.
Encourages: (1) children and teens to choose to live drug-free lives, and (2) people in the United States to promote drug-free communities and to participate in drug prevention activities.
